name: Sorry Not Sorry!
description:
Sorry Not Sorry!

A small game made for the 9th KluJam at the AAU in Klagenfurt within 48h for the theme "Punishment".

This game is inspired by "Portal" and "Will You Snail?" and it's about a little robot that is tortured by an evil computer program.

Can you overcome all obstacles that are thrown  at you and escape?

How to Play
  • Keyboard
    • WASD or arrow keys to move
    • Space to jump
  • Gamepad
    • Left stick or D-pad to move
    • A (Xbox) or X (PS) to jump
Team
  • Sebastian Uitz (https://www.firetotemgames.com/) - Project Manager, Game Design, Programming, UI
  • Michael Steinkellner (https://www.merlinnsound.com/) - Narration, Music and Sound Effects
Credits
  • 2D graphics by kenney.nl
  • 2D Character controller by Tarodev
  • Quantum font by Sesohq of dafont.com
  • "Jew's Harp, Single, A (H6 XY).wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
Changes
  • v1.0 - 24.04.2022 - Game Jam Version
